item.title: Bernie Sanders Slams Elon Musk's $1 Trillion Tesla Pay Deal: 'Insanity. Billionaire Tax Now'
item.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders called for immediate billionaire taxation after criticizing Elon Musk's $1 trillion Tesla pay package. read more

item.title: National Park Service Scraps Free Admission On MLK Day, Juneteenth: Adds Trump's Birthday In 2026
item.description: National Parks Service removes free admission on MLK Day and Juneteenth in 2026 while adding President Trump's birthday. read more

item.title: Elon Musk Denies SpaceX Is Raising Money At $800 Billion Valuation, Remains Silent On IPO
item.description: Elon Musk denied reports that SpaceX is raising funds at an $800 billion valuation, citing positive cash flow. read more

item.title: Apple Chip Chief Johny Srouji 'Seriously Considering' Exit, Raising Alarms Over Future Of iPhone, Mac Silicon
item.description: Apple crisis as top chip executive considers leaving, sparking leadership instability and AI strategy concerns. read more

item.title: Shaq Reveals How Early Mockery Over His Size Shaped The Legend He Became: 'I Got Teased A Lot For My Size, As I Got Older, Names Got Nastier'
item.description: Shaquille O'Neal once shared his inspiring journey from a bullied child to a celebrated basketball legend. read more
